name: UpdateRelationships
documentation:
Command to inform the Fluxzero Runtime about changes in entity-aggregate relationships.

These relationships allow the Runtime to determine which aggregate contains a given entity. This is crucial when targeting nested entities with commands or when appending resulting events to the appropriate aggregate.

fields.name: associations
fields.documentation: A set of new relationships between entities and aggregates that were just created or reinforced.

fields.name: dissociations
fields.documentation: A set of relationships that are no longer valid or were explicitly removed.

fields.name: guarantee
fields.documentation: Guarantees storage semantics such as durability for this update (e.g., STORED, NONE).

methods.name: routingKey
methods.documentation:
Returns a routing key to optimize dispatching. Uses the first available aggregate ID
 from the set of associations or dissociations.
